{{include reference="EESCCode.ShareMacro" /}} {{velocity}} #* * EESC share a document * ----- * * This page propose to share an existing document. * * Author: Fabio MANCINELLI * Jean SIMARD *# ############################################## ## GLOBALS ############################################## ## HTTP REQUEST PARAMETERS #set($reqStep = $request.getParameter('step')) #if($request.getParameter('cancel')) #set($reqStep = 'cancel') #end #set($reqReferer = $request.getParameter('referer')) #if(!$reqReferer) #set($reqReferer = $request.getHeader('referer')) #end #set($reqSpaceName = $request.getParameter('spacename')) #set($reqDocumentName = $request.getParameter('documentname')) #set($reqRights = $request.getParameter('rights')) #set($reqUsers = $request.getParameterValues('users')) #set($reqGroups = $request.getParameterValues('groups')) ## GLOBAL VARIABLES #set($userId = $xcontext.getUser().replace('XWiki.', '')) #set($user = $services.eesc.getUser($userId)) ############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if($reqStep.equals('cancel')) #stepCancel($reqReferer) #elseif($reqStep.equals('form') && $reqSpaceName && $reqDocumentName) #stepForm($reqSpaceName) #elseif($reqStep.equals('share') && $reqSpaceName && $reqDocumentName) #stepShare($reqSpaceName, $reqDocumentName, $reqRights, $reqUsers, $reqGroups) #else #displayError() #end #end ############################################## ## ADD DATA ############################################## #* * Share the document * ----- * * Given the HTTP POST request, create the document with the rights that apply. * * @param $spaceName The name of the folder to create * @param $documentName The name of the document to create * @param $rights The type of restriction of the document ('public', 'shared' or 'private') * @param $users The list of authorized users if it apply (if $rights is 'shared') * @param $groups The list of authorized users if it apply (if $rights is 'shared') *# #macro(stepShare, $spaceName, $documentName, $rights, $users, $groups) #set($documentref = $services.model.resolveDocument("${spaceName}.${documentName}")) #set($shareScript = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage('EESCCode.GroovyAddRights')) #set($discard = $shareScript.shareDocument($documentref, $rights, $users, $groups, [$xcontext, $xwiki, $services])) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($documentref, 'view', ''))) #end ############################################## ##
